rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0001
rows.name:
It's best if you switch around your
Assist Cores to best suit your Blades
and the enemies you're up against.

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Like if you're up against enemies
that only appear at night, equip
Night Vision.

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Or if you move around a lot to get
into better positions, Movement Heal
is what you want.

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0004
rows.name:
See? I've got myself genned up on Aux
Cores so I can defend myself the next
time the Holy Grail wants a fight!

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I know so much about Assist Cores now,
I've even got friends coming to me for
advice.

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm actually surprised myself. Never
thought I was the type to get myself
so invested in something!

rows.label: tlk43700241_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Guess I have to thank the Holy Grail for
that too!
